TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpAddressBinding extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension

Docs.summary: Represents an extensibility element added to a within an XML Web service. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class, through its <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.HttpAddressBinding.Location%2A> property, specifies the base URI for the XML Web service. For more information about XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c). For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
## Examples [!code-cpp[WebServices_HttpBinding#3](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.web.services.de_39_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[WebServices_HttpBinding#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.services.de_39_1.vb)] [!code-cs[WebServices_HttpBinding#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.services.de_39_1.cs)]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets a value representing the URL of the XML Web service.
Docs.value: A string specifying the URI for the . The default value is an empty string ("").
